fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Vivid Notions__
Signature Weapon

__Widsith__
Although only available through wishing, it is her best 4-star option.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Kagura's Verity, Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds, Tome of the Eternal Flow, Crane's Echoing Call Skyward Atlas__
Alternate 5-star options

__Oathsworn Eye__
An Event Weapon from 2.5, but a decent free option.

__Flowing Purity__
The Fontaine Craftable Weapon, only to be used if no other options are available.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Electro DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: By the Horns
**2)** Elemental Burst: Guardian Vent!
**3)** Elemental Skill: Riding the Night-Rainbow

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Marechaussee Hunter__ is a viable set if Furina is on the team.
__Vermillion Hereafter__ or __Thundering Fury__ are also possible options, but have resin-inefficient domains.
